statements: SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE security_id = 12345;
SELECT security_name, market_price FROM market_data WHERE volume_traded > 1000;
SELECT date_recorded, security_name FROM market_data ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT security_name, volume_traded FROM market_data WHERE market_price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE security_id = 100;
SELECT security_name, market_price FROM market_data WHERE volume_traded > 10000 ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT security_id, security_name, date_recorded FROM market_data WHERE market_price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00 ORDER BY date_recorded ASC;
SELECT MAX(market_price), MIN(market_price), AVG(volume_traded) FROM market_data WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT security_id, security_name, volume_traded FROM market_data WHERE market_price > 200.00 AND volume_traded <= 5000 ORDER BY volume_traded DESC, security_id ASC;
SELECT symbol, price, volume, last_updated FROM market_data;
SELECT price, symbol, volume, last_updated FROM market_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000 AND price < 50;
SELECT client_id, symbol, quantity, investment_date FROM client_investments ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE price > 100 AND volume < 5000 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data WHERE symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL', 'AMZN')
SELECT symbol, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM market_data GROUP BY symbol
SELECT m.symbol, m.price, c.quantity FROM market_data m INNER JOIN client_investments c ON m.symbol = c.symbol WHERE c.client_id = 123
SELECT * FROM client_investments WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM MarketData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 10000;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM Clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Investments WHERE shares > 100 AND investment_amount > 5000;
SELECT client_name, account_balance FROM Clients WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT client_name, account_balance, stock_symbol FROM Clients JOIN Investments ON Clients.client_id = Investments.client_id WHERE account_balance > 5000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT client_name, account_balance, stock_symbol FROM Clients INNER JOIN Investments ON Clients.client_id = Investments.client_id WHERE client_name LIKE 'J%' AND shares > 100 ORDER BY stock_symbol;
SELECT SUM(shares) as total_shares, AVG(investment_amount) as avg_investment_amount FROM Investments GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING total_shares > 500;

SELECT client_id, client_name, investment_amount, stock_symbol FROM Clients LEFT JOIN Investments ON Clients.client_id = Investments.client_id WHERE investment_id IS NULL ORDER BY client_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM MarketData;
SELECT market_name, last_price FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT market_name, last_price, last_updated FROM MarketData ORDER BY last_price DESC;
SELECT client_name, email FROM Clients WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT client_name, market_name, amount_invested FROM Clients C JOIN Investments I ON C.client_id = I.client_id JOIN MarketData M ON I.market_id = M.market_id ORDER BY amount_invested DESC;
SELECT market_name, last_price FROM MarketData ORDER BY last_price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 5;
SELECT i.client_id, i.amount_invested, m.market_name FROM Investments i INNER JOIN MarketData m ON i.market_id = m.market_id WHERE i.amount_invested > 1000 ORDER BY i.amount_invested DESC;
SELECT ip.performance_metric, ip.value, ip.report_date FROM InvestmentPerformance ip WHERE ip.performance_metric = 'ROI' AND ip.value > 0.05 ORDER BY ip.report_date ASC;

SELECT c.client_name, c.email, i.amount_invested, m.market_name, ip.value FROM Clients c INNER JOIN Investments i ON c.client_id = i.client_id INNER JOIN MarketData m ON i.market_id = m.market_id INNER JOIN InvestmentPerformance ip ON i.investment_id = ip.investment_id WHERE c.client_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM Market_Data ORDER BY price DESC, volume ASC
SELECT symbol, company_name, price FROM Market_Data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY symbol ASC
SELECT client_name, age, account_balance FROM Clients WHERE risk_tolerance = 'low' ORDER BY account_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM Investment_Firms WHERE location LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_date, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Market_Data ORDER BY company_name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM Market_Data WHERE symbol LIKE 'AAPL%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT firm_name, location, founding_date FROM Investment_Firms WHERE founding_date >= '2000-01-01' ORDER BY founding_date;
SELECT client_name, age, account_balance FROM Clients WHERE risk_tolerance = 'low' ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC;
